Biography Formed: 1992 in Downpatrick, Northern Ireland Genre: Rock Years Active: '90s, '00s, '10s Northern Irish punk-pop trio Ash were tentatively formed in 1989, when childhood mates Tim Wheeler and Mark Hamilton received guitars for Christmas and established a metal act named Vietnam. Following a handful of shows, Vietnam adopted the Ash moniker in 1992 and added Rick "Rock" McMurray on drums.
